plot: A documentary that chronicles both Thor Heyerdahl's path towards the Kon-Tiki expedition, as well as the filmmakers similar path of making the epic motion picture, and what all of them sacrifice on their road to success.
title: Seile sin egen sjø
plot_es: A documentary that chronicles both Thor Heyerdahl's path towards the Kon-Tiki expedition, as well as the filmmakers similar path of making the epic motion picture, and what all of them sacrifice on their road to success.
